ygData.subject: Re: Dwarven Axe?
ygData.msgSnippet: 10pp...... you got taken for a little ride.  I ve seen em for 7pp.
ygData.messageBody:
10pp...... you got taken for a little ride. I've seen em for 7pp.

Guillaume Voizard wrote:

> From: Guillaume Voizard <gvoizard@...>
>
> > If you don't mind, where can one purchase a Dwarven axe and what are it's
> stats?
>
> I have purchased my Dwarven Battle Axe for 10pp in Greater Faydark.
> It's may be one of the best non magical 1HSlashing weapon of the game.
> DMG: 6
> Delay: 26
> WT: 4 (very light)
> Range: 40 (but you never use it that way)
> As somebody told you before, you can find it in Crushbone. But I don't
> remember if you have to kill the Warlord, or Lord ??? in the castle.
>
> Erwin, Paladin of Tunare, Fennin Ro.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> ONElist: the best source for group communications.
> http://www.onelist.com
> Join a new list today!
